artist: Editor: Andy Baird; Artist: Michael Brehm; Artist: Robert Corbit; Artist: Frank Gaard; Artist: Janet Groenert; Artist: Mike McCoy; Artist: William McKearn; Artist: Greg Miller; Artist: Rick Noble; Artist: Craig Smith; Artist: Jennifer Sobin; Artist: Melissa Stang; Artist: Terre van Haren; Artist: Tim Walton; Artist: Coleen West; Artist: Jon West; Publisher: Artpolice, Minneapolis
description: 12 pages ,saddle-stapled; black-and-white publication with letters "Artpolice" across top; the letter "O" contains a small child's face; design features a large turtle whose front legs have webbed fingers and whose back legs are arms with hands; there is a large mask-like face on the turtle's back
title: Artpolice International, Vol. 1
